pkgmetadata.longdescription: A Fast Tool for Single-Cell Spatially Variable Genes Identifications on Large-Scale Data // Identifying spatially variable genes is critical in linking molecular cell functions with tissue phenotypes. This package utilizes a granularity- based dimension-agnostic tool, single-cell big-small patch (scBSP), implementing sparse matrix operation and KD tree methods for distance calculation, for the identification of spatially variable genes on large-scale data. The detailed description of this method is available at Wang, J. and Li, J. et al. 2023 (Wang, J. and Li, J. (2023), doi:10.1038/s41467-023-43256-5).
